snippet: Shire agrees to buy NPS Pharmaceuticals for $5.2 billion. | Banks brace for a jolt as the price of oil falls. | Kicking Dodd-Frank in the teeth. | David A. O’Neil, a federal prosecutor, is joining the law firm Debevoise & Plimpton.
abstract: Shire agrees to buy NPS Pharmaceuticals for $5.2 billion. | Banks brace for a jolt as the price of oil falls. | Kicking Dodd-Frank in the teeth. | David A. O’Neil, a federal prosecutor, is joining the law firm Debevoise & Plimpton.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Shire's Deal for NPS
